title: What are some of the best non technical jobs for engineers? - Quora

response.answer_text: Engineering is one such field which gives an individual, the finest blend of both technical as well as non technical work culture. As many of us have our own faiths / conceptions / miss-conceptions about Engineering regarding the uncertainty of jobs or work apprehension, people often wave away from Engineering in search of stress less yet lucrative 10 to 5 jobs. Some highly appreciated non technical jobs includes but not limited to Management, Economics, Business Analysis, Consultancy as well as Teaching in particular for TOEFL, GRE, IELTS with a good hand at Math and English. Some recent trends also suggest fields of Humanities like Governance, Administration and Public Policy making to attract Engineers like never before. While a Engineer is considered to be a Person with technical background only, it is seldom true especially with the the ratio of people to placement. So, thinking of a non technical job which requires technical background is one fine choice to work where you apply Engineering knowledge to solve generic problems.
